statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); git_info=""; if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git_branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null) && git_status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') && git_info=" [${git_branch}$([ "$git_status" -gt 0 ] && echo " +${git_status}" || echo "")]"; fi; printf "\033[2m%s in %s%s | %s\033[0m" "$model_name" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_info" "$output_style"
